Package org.jdrupes.httpcodec.server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HttpRequestDecoder
    A decoder for HTTP requests that accepts data from a sequence of ByteBuffers.
    HttpResponseEncoder  
    HttpServerEngine
    An engine that can be used as an HTTP server.
